page.title: 10FARMING ROUND WALKINGTON.
page.content: PEAS GROWN UNDER CONTRACT TO BIRDS EYE USE 14.5% OF THE LAND.WINTER WHEAT FOR SEED OR FLOUR 39%,WINTER BARLEY FOR SEED AND MALTING OR SPRING BARLEY JUST FOR MALTING ANOTHER 23%.MALTING IS FOR WHISKY,BEER,VINEGAR etc.WHEAT AND BARLEY ARE ALSO USED FOR ANIMAL FEED.3.5% OF OUR AREA GROWS SUGAR BEET AND 7.5% OIL SEED RAPE FOR COOKING OIL OR SEED. 8% OF THE LAND IS UNDER GRASS FOR HAY MAKING OR GRAZING WITH OTHER SMALL AREAS OF KALE,SWEDES,BEANS,MANGOLDS OR CLOVER_LEY FOR ANIMALS AND POTATOES, SPROUTS,TURNIPS & CABBAGE FOR HUMANS. MOST FARMS HAVE ANIMALS,ALL REARING AND FATTENING FOR MEAT.THE LARGEST UNIT HAS 100 SOWS GIVING OVER 2000 PIGLETS YEARLY.PIGS ARE KEPT INDOORS ALL THE YEAR,SHEEP OUTDOORS,COWS IN FOR THE WINTER.THE FARM WITH 136 EWES HAD 195 LAMBS PLUS THE WOOL PRODUCTION
